lego: I hope you'll be able to
practice_phrases: I hope you'll be able to speak Chinese.
我希望你能说普通话。
I hope you'll be able to know the answer.
我希望你能知道答案。
I hope you'll be able to speak better soon.
我希望你能很快说得更好。
I hope you'll be able to be there this afternoon.
我希望你能今天下午在那里。

我希望你能知道哪些朋友说普通话。
I hope you'll be able to know most people there.

我想知道你很快能不能说普通话。
